ygData.subject: Web Update
ygData.msgSnippet: A pretty big update this week-end: Added N. Ro, Made Changes to Lesser Faydark, Re-did Misty Thicket, Added a very basic Blackburrow, Under map of part of the
ygData.messageBody:
A pretty big update this week-end:

Added N. Ro, Made Changes to Lesser Faydark, Re-did Misty Thicket, Added a
very basic Blackburrow, Under map of part of the area. I don't know when I
will get back there, so I posted what I had.

Added an Faction Page with the few factions I know of, and who to kill to
change those factions.

Added an Equipment Page with Weapon info. This info is stored in a Access
Database so I can create Class specific or skill specific pages. Please let
me know how you would want to view this info.

Also, I would be interested in getting some info on weapons that I do not
have. Please send me a edited screenshot of the weapon info box. Please DO
NOT send me the entire shot, I don't have a fast enough connection. Just
the box please. I will try to give a little credit to people that help out.
To take a screenshot hit the - key on the numberpad.

Changed both the Fletching and Smithing Guides with more upto date info.
Also made some editing changes to make them more readable. If anything is
unclear to anyone please e-mail me so I can clear it up.
Xezol - Lvl 13 Gnome Mag on E'Ci

Visit My EverQuest Page; including zone maps, trade skill guides, general
weapons info, and more:
http://www.dubuque.net/~sirkal/EverQuest.htm
